comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This is Avenida 16 de Septiembre in Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua, México. To the right is seen de atrium of the cathedral, the trees are those of the Plaza de Armas and to the left (not seen) the Post Office Administration building. The camera is facing east (then by shadows casting, it could be about 3-4 p m). In your collection at digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=... you can zoom in and see on the background, to the left, the French-towered building, which is the old customs house (Avenida 16 de Septiembre and Avenida Juárez). Dr. Roberto Duarte Cirujano Plástico
